title: SEO Configuration
subtitle: Optimize your store for search engines and social media
description: Configure all SEO aspects of your store to rank better on Google and social media.

advanced.title: Advanced SEO
advanced.description: Additional settings to improve your ranking

metaTitle.label: SEO Title
metaTitle.placeholder: My Store - The best online store
metaTitle.hint: The title that will appear in Google search results (max 60 characters)
metaTitle.help: A good title includes your brand and important keywords.

metaDescription.label: Meta Description
metaDescription.placeholder: Find the best products in our online store. Free shipping, amazing prices and personalized service.
metaDescription.hint: The description that will appear in Google search results (max 160 characters)
metaDescription.help: Describe your store attractively and include relevant keywords.

keywords.label: Keywords
keywords.placeholder: online store, products, free shipping, quality
keywords.help: Include words your customers would search for to find your store.

ogTitle.label: Social Media Title
ogTitle.hint: Title that will appear when sharing on Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, etc.
ogTitle.help: Can be different from SEO title to be more socially appealing.

ogDescription.label: Social Media Description
ogDescription.placeholder: Discover our amazing selection of products! Free shipping on all your purchases.
ogDescription.hint: Description that will appear when sharing on social media
ogDescription.help: Use a more casual and appealing tone than in meta description.

ogImage.label: Social Media Image
ogImage.description: This image will be shown when your store is shared on social media
ogImage.dropzone: Drop an image here or click to select

whatsappImage.label: WhatsApp Image
whatsappImage.description: Image optimized specifically for WhatsApp (400x400px, max. 400KB)
whatsappImage.dropzone: Drop an image here or click to select
whatsappImage.hint: Recommended size: 400x400px • Formats: JPG, PNG • Max. 400KB

favicon.label: Favicon
favicon.description: Icon that appears in the browser tab
favicon.dropzone: Drop an image here or click to select

robots.label: Robots Configuration
robots.description: Control how search engines index your store

canonicalUrl.label: Canonical URL
canonicalUrl.help: Only needed if you have a custom domain.

structuredData.label: Structured Data
structuredData.description: Helps Google better understand your store

google.title: Google Preview
google.description: This is how your store will look in Google search results

social.title: Social Media Preview
social.description: This is how it will look when sharing your store on Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, etc.

analytics.title: Analytics and Tracking
analytics.description: Connect tools to measure your store's performance

googleSearch.label: Google Search Console
googleSearch.help: To see how your store appears in Google searches

metaPixel.label: Meta Pixel (Facebook)
metaPixel.help: For targeted advertising on Facebook and Instagram

sitemap.title: Sitemap
sitemap.description: Helps search engines find all pages of your store

performance.title: SEO Performance
performance.description: Important metrics for your store's SEO

tips.title: Tips to improve your SEO
items: Use descriptive and unique titles for each page
Include keywords naturally in your descriptions
Optimize images with descriptive alternative text
Use structured data for better indexing
Get quality links to your store
